# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O nfvo-driver-sdnc-zte-1.0.0.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1084/org/openo/nfvo/sfc-driver-standalone/nfvo-drivers-sdnc-zte-sfc-driver/1.0.0/nfvo-drivers-sdnc-zte-sfc-driver-1.0.0.zip && unzip -q -o -B nfvo-driver-sdnc-zte-1.0.0.zip && rm -f nfvo-driver-sdnc-zte-1.0.0.zip
EXPOSE 8411
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0 autorelease-1084 > OPENO_VERSION
